roleset.name: separate

example.name: all args
example.text: The Washington, D.C., think tank recommends that [the courts]-1 adopt different ``tracks'' for different types of civil cases in order *trace*-1 to separate the handling of highly complex suits from simpler ones.
example.arg: the handling of highly complex suits

roleset.note: Frames file for 'separate' based on financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet; adjectival 'separated' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls separate-23.1-2, remove-10.1, classify-29.10.

example.name: adjectival rel: separated
example.text: It seems like it 's pretty separated from any harm to the animal .
example.arg: from any harm to the animal
